Detailed Description

seDRMHierarchySummaryItem wraps the DRM <Hierarchy_Summary_Item> class.

Member Function Documentation

virtual SE_DRM_Class sedris::seDRMHierarchySummaryItem::getClassType (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Gets the DRM class type this object can reference (mostly internal use).

Warning:
Don't confuse with getDRMClass(), which is dependent on the actual type held by this DRM class object reference.
Returns:
SE_CLS_DRM_HIERARCHY_SUMMARY_ITEM
